content: I'am new using FHIR, I've been creating resources (generally patients), but I didn't figure out the best filed to store a "national health number" here https://www.hl7.org/fhir/patient.html
this is just Patient.identifier, with a suitable "system"

Check https://simplifier.net/frenchprofiledfhirar/frpatient (Active) or https://simplifier.net/frenchprofiledfhirar/frpatientins (Draft) where the INS is defined as a specific slice of the identifier. System depends on whether you're using INS-NIR, INS-NIA or INS-C
